parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Identity </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets identity of a person. The identities could be defined in a custom config in [[Description.ext#CfgIdentities|Description.ext]] or in the main config. For a list of available main config values see [[CfgIdentities]].
<br><br> 
This command is an aggregate of the following commands: [[setName]], [[setFace]], [[setSpeaker]], [[setNameSound]], [[setPitch]], only the values are loaded from the given config. It also includes value for glasses for which currently there is no direct command, instead there is an inventory command [[addGoggles]]. </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[setIdentity]] identity </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]] - unit to which the identity will be applied </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> identity: [[String]] - name of the subclass in [[CfgIdentities]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldier1 [[setIdentity]] "MyLittleSoldier";</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Clone factory in MP: <code>[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 1 [[to]] 10 do
{
	_bob = [[group]] [[player]] [[createUnit]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[typeOf]] [[player]], [[position]] [[player]], [], 0, "none"]; 
	[_bob, "MyLittleSoldier"] [[remoteExec]] ["setIdentity", 0, _bob];
};</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setFace]], [[setName]], [[setNameSound]], [[setSpeaker]], [[setPitch]], [[addGoggles]], [[loadIdentity]], [[lockIdentity]], [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers#HandleIdentity | HandleIdentity EH]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
